channel.title: Everydaystem | Education Program
channel.description: Recent content on Everydaystem | Education Program

item.title: How It's Made : EverydayStem Site
item.description: The Everydaystem site is seemingly feature rich and aesthetically pleasing website. It would make sense to assume that constructing such a site is both costly and complex but this couldn’t be further from the truth.

item.title: Youtube Recommendations
item.description: Youtube is a remarkable platform. To have free access to so much great quality content is simply unprecedented. We, however, understand that it is incredibly difficult to navigate such a vast sea of information.
